text: Caren Marsh Doll (born April 6, 1919), born as Caren Morris, is an American actress and dancer. She was Judy Garland's stand-in for The Wizard of Oz (1939) and Ziegfeld Girl in 1941. She is the only known surviving member of the cast of The Wizard of Oz. She is also the only known surviving member of the cast of Gone with the Wind even though she had a small uncredited role in the movie. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Hollywood Category:American centenarians Category:American dancers Category:American television actors Category:Pseudonyms Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Caren Marsh Doll
